revised_title: Silurian Plant-Remains from Victoria, Australia: Connecting and Extending Floras
tldr: The author examines plant-remains from the Silurian period in Victoria, Australia, and connects them to previously described floras. The study provides new insights into the evolution of Silurian plants and contributes to a better understanding of the region's geological history. The findings help to extend and connect the knowledge of plant life during the Silurian period.
